import json


jsonFile = "schoolLocation.json"
f = open(jsonFile)
fileData = f.read()
f.close()
schoolList = json.loads(fileData)

for (k,v) in schoolList.items():
  print k + " " + str(v)

result = {}

for i in range(1, nrows):
	school = table.row(i)[0].value
	code = table.row(i)[2].value
	result[school] = int(code)

jsonContent = JSONEncoder().encode(result)
fileName = "schoolLocation.json"
fp = open(fileName, 'w+')
fp.write(jsonContent)
fp.close()
